author: William Mansell
title: Coronavirus updates: Michael Avenatti granted release from prison due to COVID-19
description: The coronavirus death toll in the U.S. continues to decline, but officials are hopeful the curve might be flattening in some areas.
content:
While many countries around the world and cities in the U.S. are pointing toward positive signs that social distancing might be finally flattening the curve, the novel coronavirus death toll continues to be staggering.
